hints.content:
Each bill has a different value.

Dollar name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
One dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/526e9b19f2c39d0d908b6c531d510186f6e93e97.png) | $\$1$
Five dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/5069901d0226c2c5f1c3e73b2b5d7e48ee1e1eee.png) | $\$5$
Ten dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/35b0286a92e1825d39af39b5e362e5d9674eb00d.png) | $\$10$
Twenty dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/66f0febd8ba41a0e3413f72b2f1fc2d54a3819de.png) | $\$20$

Which bill matches the image?

Let's find out how much money Ari has in her piggy bank.

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/31af2af3eb1a746a8e21e91268cf4bfd4530786b.png)

$\underbrace{\$\maroonD{10} + \$\maroonD{10}}_{\maroonD{2}{\text{ ten dollar bills}}}+\underbrace{\$\purpleD{5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}} + \underbrace{\$\blueE{1}}_{\blueE{1}{\text{ one dollar bill}}}= \$26$

Ari has $\$26$ in her piggy bank.

On her birthday, she got $2$ one dollar bills and $1$ ten dollar bill. Let's add the money to the $\$26$ in her piggy bank.

$\underbrace{\$26}_{{\text{ piggy bank money}}} + \underbrace{\$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1}}_{\blueE{2}{\text{ one dollar bills}}}  + \underbrace{\$\maroonD{10}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ ten dollar bill}}}= \$38$

Ari had $\$38$ after her birthday.

question.content:
Ari had this much money in her piggy bank before her birthday.

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/31af2af3eb1a746a8e21e91268cf4bfd4530786b.png)

On her birthday, she got $2$ one dollar bills and $1$ ten dollar bill.

**How much money does Ari have now?**
